actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to postpone for 1 year the effective date of indirect source regulations under the Clean Air Act.

summary.text: Provides that the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency shall postpone for one year (until January 1, 1976) the effective date of indirect source regulations under the Clean Air Act.

titles.title: A bill to postpone for 1 year the effective date of indirect source regulations under the Clean Air Act.
